name: Cooperative Elements
description:
The download on this page only supports internet-based multiplayer, which I realize may prohibit some from playing it. Because the submission period has expired, I created a temporary page where you can download a version that supports split-screen multiplayer here.

You and a buddy must traverse the elemental themed puzzles to acquire trophies.

Made for the LMOB Beginners Game Jam (5/3-5/8 2021)

Developed using Unreal Engine, Blender, and OcenAudio.

Honestly the whole first day I thought I was supposed to make an element based game because I'm lazy and didn't think to check any official postings. Oops ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
